nodes.text: A shuttlebus was a type of repulsorlift public mass transit shuttle used for transport in and around cities. Shuttlebuses operated in Adascopolis on the Colonies planet of Arkania and at the Ord Mynock Freeport. Shuttlebuses would take travelers arriving in the spaceport to elsewhere in the city. Arkanian Offshoots, forced to live on the outskirts of Adascopolis, could also utilize shuttlebuses to reach their outlying settlements.
